short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically detects websites that have sniptes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The code we hide is bits of script, little easter eggs we calls snipte.

Fallow links, find hints and look for sneaky stars on sites like...

< *** Start Snipte > 
< ***** End Snipte >

Cut and paste snipte and make cool stuff. 

Check source on www.CoderDojo.org and find the first game!

More an more snipte are out there to find go look and maybe see the big plan....

How 2 use Snipte?? Go here -> http://www.snipte.org/textedit.html
How 2 find Snipte?? Go here -> http://www.snipte.org/plugin.html
How 2 make Snipte?? Go here -> http://www.snipte.org/developer.html

Luck! Laters! Come back!
